Sentencas: The perovskite system La1-xSrxCr1-yMyO3-delta (M, Mn, Fe and V) has recently attracted much attention as a candidate material for the fabrication of solid oxide fuel cells (SCFCs) due to its stability in both H-2 and CH4 atmospheres at temperatures up to 1000 degrees C.
Titulo: Use of La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3 materials in composite anodes for direct ethanol solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this paper, we report the synthesis of La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3 (LSCM) by solid-state reaction and its employment as an alternative anode material for anode-supported SOFCs.
Titulo: Use of La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3 materials in composite anodes for direct ethanol solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Because LSCM shows a greatly decreased electronic conductivity in a reducing atmosphere Compared to that in air, we have fabricated Cu-LSCM-ScSZ (scandia-stabilized zirconia) composite anodes by tape-casting and a wet-impregnation method.
Titulo: Use of La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3 materials in composite anodes for direct ethanol solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Additionally, a composite structure (Support anode, functional anode and electrolyte) structure with a layer of Cu-LSCM-YSZ (yttria-stabilized zirconia) on the supported anode surface has been manufactured by tape-casting and screen-printing.
Titulo: Use of La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3 materials in composite anodes for direct ethanol solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Single cells with these two kinds of anodes have been fabricated, and their performance characteristics using hydrogen and ethanol have been measured.
Titulo: Use of La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3 materials in composite anodes for direct ethanol solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In the operation period, no obvious carbon deposition was observed when these cells were operated on ethanol.
Titulo: Use of La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3 materials in composite anodes for direct ethanol solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These results demonstrate the stability of LSCM in an ethanol atmosphere and its potential utilization in anode-supported SCFCs.
Titulo: Use of La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.5Mn0.5O3 materials in composite anodes for direct ethanol solid oxide fuel cells
